dmca.title: Cease and Desist Request
dmca.body:
Dear A:
 
Please consider this correspondence a formal request to cease and desist hosting a blog comment section where people are permitted to libel me, accuse me of criminal behavior, accuse me of fraud, accuse me of posting on your blog under other identities, and various other defamation of which there is no substantiation on or offline, whatsoever.
 
I have never posted on your blog as myself or as someone else. I would be willing to swear to this in an affidavit if necessary. I am sending this mail to an attorney who is very savvy about Internet harassment.

Whatever sabotaging is going on in your comment section, it is not coming from me. I am not concerned about the petty grievances or insults that the trolls have for me, but when it crosses the line into public defamation, it has gone too far.

My IP number is:  68.225.94.201

It will trace to cox in Lakewood, Ohio. I do not have an Internet at work.

If you do not know how to find IPs on your blog or how to trace them, I am sure someone can assist you in this matter. Until you can prove that I have sabotaged your blog in any way, based on the imprint of my IP on your blog, I would expect you to retract that accusation. 

As I said, I am willing to swear to it in a court of law and turn over my logs. I have nothing to hide.
